title: Old T-shirt Font ID help
content:
Good Evening. I’m trying to create a t-shirt logo in the spirit of the font that is used in the attached photo. I’m having a hard time identifying it. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,  
Karl

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ziesing.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020550/http:/typophile.com/files/ziesing.jpg) | 150.53 KB |
author: karl bischoff

comments.content:
[Gold Rush Open](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020550/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/gold-rush/open/) is similar. Maybe that will be close enough for your task.

- Mike Yanega
